text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
——Doesn't matter who it is. 
We fight anyone strong. 
That's how we L/Roars roll.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
This upcoming race—I'll 
be there. I'll break their spirits 
with my running.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
…Heh. Aight, see ya later. 
Got something small to 
take care of on my end.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Cafeteria's got 3 limited-time parfaits 
on sale right now! Wanna go? 
Like right now? Hey?! C'mon!
